channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Analysis: Taiwan's Domestic Communications Satellite Plan
item.description: Taiwan plans to build its own communication satellite program, which some have compared to SpaceX's Starlink system. Reporter Chris Gorin spoke to analyst Jyh-Shyang Sheu from the

item.title: Opposition Parties Propose Allowing First Responders To Form Unions
item.description: Taiwan's two main opposition parties are proposing changes to Taiwan's labor union laws to allow firefighters and police officers to unionize, something they are currently prohibit

item.title: Sea Turtle Entangled in Discarded Fishing Line Rescued
item.description: A green sea turtle in southern Taiwan has been rescued after becoming entangled in a discarded fishing line.

item.title: Taiwanese Inventors Clean Up at World Genius Convention in Japan
